edge: Anil Kapoor plays the character of Sagar Pandey 'Majnu Bhai' in the movie.

node_2: ajju bhai / ajay barsi, freedom fighter, dr. ghunghroo's stepson and payal's son
edge: John Abraham plays the character of Ajju Bhai / Ajay Barsi, Freedom Fighter, Dr. Ghunghroo's stepson and Payal's son in the movie.

Ankita Srivastava plays the character of Babita / Rajkumari Chandini in the movie.

Supriya Karnik plays the character of Payal Ghungroo in the movie.
Ranjeet plays the character of Vikrant Kapoor in the movie.
Rajpal Yadav plays the character of Tailor in the movie.
Neeraj Vora plays the character of Badshah Khan in the movie.
Mushtaq Khan plays the character of Ballu in the movie.
